overview: The purpose of this measure is to appropriate funds for the operating and capital improvement costs of the Judiciary for the fiscal biennium beginning on July 1, 2025, and ending on June 30, 2027. [14] Your Committee on Conference has amended this measure by inserting appropriate operating and capital improvement amounts for fiscal biennium 2025-2027. [14] This Act shall take effect on July 1, 2025. [13]
appropriations: This budget measure, as amended, appropriates operating totals from general funds of $201,725,676 (HB400_CD1_CCR157_.htm.txt) for FY 2025-2026 and $199,579,345 (HB400_CD1_CCR157_.htm.txt) for FY 2026-2027. [14] From all means of finance, the operating totals are $214,571,429 (HB400_CD1_CCR157_.htm.txt) for FY 2025-2026 and $212,425,098 (HB400_CD1_CCR157_.htm.txt) for FY 2026-2027. [14] Of the general fund appropriation for administration (JUD601), the sum of $2,218,922 (HB400_CD1_.HTM.txt) shall be expended for salary adjustments for fiscal year 2025-2026. [13]
assumptions_and_methodology: Your Committee on Conference has amended this measure by inserting appropriate operating and capital improvement amounts for fiscal biennium 2025-2027. [14]
agency_impact: The operating budget for JUD601 - ADMINISTRATION from general funds is $39,723,183 for FY 2025-2026 and $37,353,371 for FY 2026-2027. [13] Of the general fund appropriation for administration (JUD601), the sum of $2,218,922 (HB400_CD1_.HTM.txt) or so much thereof as may be necessary for fiscal year 2025-2026 shall be expended for salary adjustments as recommended by the commission on salaries. [13]
policy_impact: Your Committee on Conference has amended this measure by changing the effective date to July 1, 2025. [14] This Act shall take effect on July 1, 2025. [13]
revenue_sources: This budget measure, as amended, appropriates operating totals from general funds of $201,725,676 (HB400_CD1_CCR157_.htm.txt) for FY 2025-2026 and $199,579,345 (HB400_CD1_CCR157_.htm.txt) for FY 2026-2027. [14] This budget measure, as amended, appropriates capital improvement totals from general obligation bonds of $12,900,000 (HB400_CD1_CCR157_.htm.txt) for FY 2025-2026. [14] The sum total of the general obligation bonds so issued shall not exceed $12,900,000 (HB400_CD1_.HTM.txt). [13]
six_year_fiscal_implications: This measure appropriates funds for the Judiciary for the fiscal biennium beginning 7/1/2025 and ending 6/30/2027. [13] As amended, this budget measure appropriates operating totals from general funds of $201,725,676 (HB400_CD1_CCR157_.htm.txt) for FY 2025-2026 and $199,579,345 (HB400_CD1_CCR157_.htm.txt) for FY 2026-2027. [14] From all means of finance, operating totals are appropriated at $214,571,429 (HB400_CD1_CCR157_.htm.txt) for FY 2025-2026 and $212,425,098 (HB400_CD1_CCR157_.htm.txt) for FY 2026-2027. [14] Additionally, this budget measure, as amended, appropriates capital improvement totals from general obligation bonds of $12,900,000 (HB400_CD1_CCR157_.htm.txt) for FY 2025-2026. [14] All appropriations made for fiscal year 2025-2026 and fiscal year 2026-2027 that are unencumbered as of June 30, 2028, shall lapse as of that date. [13]
updates_from_previous_fiscal_note: Operating appropriations from general funds have been updated to $201,725,676 (HB400_CD1_CCR157_.htm.txt) for FY 2025-2026 and $199,579,345 (HB400_CD1_CCR157_.htm.txt) for FY 2026-2027. [14] A new provision specifies that $2,218,922 (HB400_CD1_.HTM.txt) of the general fund appropriation for administration (JUD601) shall be expended for salary adjustments in fiscal year 2025-2026. [13] The effective date of the measure has been changed from July 1, 2050, to July 1, 2025. [14]
